attributes.additional_details: Fireworks pose significant distress to the vulnerable, including our pets, children, and veterans with PTSD. Furthermore, our environment. Firework displays can result in uncontrolled fires, and cause pollution. For these reasons, I urge you to consider the negative side of these “beautiful” fireworks, and think of your community, country, and Earth.
attributes.background: This petition is to advocate for the ban of Firework displays. In the 2025/26 new year’s eve celebration alone, the UK spent £30-40 million on fireworks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Ban both private and public use of fireworks & replace with cleaner alternatives" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750214
